sql.name: 添加机箱
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_machine_box(id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num, install_space,org_id,build_manager,project_id, create_date) VALUES (':boxId', ':boxNumber', ':nfcNumber', :longitude, :latitude, :processorNum, ':installSpace', ':orgId', ':userId', ':projectId', ':createDate')

sql.name: 修改机箱
sql.content: UPDATE t_machine_box SET box_number=':boxNumber', nfc_number=':nfcNumber', longitude=:longitude, latitude=:latitude, processor_num=:processorNum ,install_space=':installSpace' WHERE id = ':boxId'

sql.name: 根据ID获取机箱
sql.content: SELECT id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num,install_space FROM t_machine_box WHERE id = ':boxId'

sql.name: 检查机箱编号是否存在
sql.content: SELECT count(*) as countNum FROM t_machine_box WHERE id != ':boxId' AND box_number = ':boxNumber'

sql.name: 获取用户当前项目的机箱列表
sql.content: select id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num, enable_edit, submit_num, create_date from ( SELECT id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num, enable_edit, 0 AS submit_num, b.create_date FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.project_id = ':projectId' AND b.build_manager = ':userId' AND not exists (select machine_box_id from t_machine_box_submit s where s.machine_box_id = b.id ) UNION SELECT id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num, enable_edit, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_machine_box_submit t2 WHERE t2.machine_box_id = b.id) AS submit_num, b.create_date FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.project_id = ':projectId' AND b.build_manager = ':userId' AND exists (select machine_box_id from t_machine_box_submit s where s.machine_box_id = b.id ) ) ta order by create_date

sql.name: 获取用户当前项目提交机箱验收进度
sql.content: SELECT b.id, b.box_number, b.nfc_number, b.longitude, b.latitude, b.processor_num , (SELECT count(*) FROM t_machine_box_submit t2 WHERE t2.machine_box_id = b.id) AS submit_num, confirm_install_date, confirm_debug_date, pm_confirm_date FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.project_id = ':projectId' AND b.build_manager = ':userId' and (b.enable_edit = 'N' or b.enable_edit is null) and exists (select id from t_machine_box_submit t4 where t4.machine_box_id = b.id) order by b.create_date

sql.name: 获取用户当前项目提交机箱验收进度
sql.content: SELECT id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num, enable_edit, 0 AS submit_num FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.build_manager = ':userId' AND not exists (select machine_box_id from t_machine_box_submit s where s.machine_box_id = b.id ) order by b.create_date

sql.name: 根据ID删除机箱下的处理器
根据ID删除机箱下的探测器
sql.content: DELETE FROM t_detector WHERE processor_id IN (SELECT id FROM t_processor WHERE machine_box_id = ':boxId' )

sql.name: 根据机箱ID获取机箱下属处理器|探测器信息
sql.content: SELECT p.id, (select count(*) from t_detector d where d.processor_id = p.id) AS detector_num FROM t_processor p WHERE p.machine_box_id = ':boxId'

sql.name: 更改机箱状态
sql.content: UPDATE t_machine_box SET enable_edit = ':status' WHERE id = ':boxId'

sql.name: 根据ID获取机箱
sql.content: SELECT id, box_number, nfc_number, longitude, latitude, processor_num, enable_edit, pm_confirm_date FROM t_machine_box WHERE id = ':boxId'

sql.name: 设置机箱为验收
sql.content: UPDATE t_machine_box SET pm_confirm_date = ':curDate' WHERE id = ':boxId'

sql.name: 获取机箱下IP为空的处理器列表
sql.content: SELECT id, nfc_number, moxa_number, processor_id, ip FROM t_processor WHERE machine_box_id = ':boxId' AND (ip IS NULL OR ip = '0.0.0.0' OR ip = '' )

sql.name: 获取机箱下的处理器配置文件是否维护
sql.content: SELECT id, nfc_number, moxa_number, processor_id, ip FROM t_processor WHERE machine_box_id = ':boxId' AND (config_file IS NULL || detector_file IS NULL || config_file ='' || detector_file = '')

sql.name: 获取用户应建机箱数量
sql.content: SELECT id, allow_box_num FROM t_project_personnel WHERE project_id = ':projectId' and user_id = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取用户实际建的机箱数量
sql.content: SELECT id FROM t_machine_box WHERE project_id = ':projectId' and build_manager = ':userId'
